tool_description: With the Voter Verification API, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that the individuals you onboard are holding a valid Voter Card issued by the Government of India, are eligible to vote, and have provided you with reliable identity and address proofs.

api_list.name: Voter
api_list.description: This API function retrieves full details of a voter, ensuring that the individual holds a valid Voter Card and is eligible to vote.
